00087 class EGS_EXTENDED_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_ExtendedShape : public EGS_BaseShape {
00088 
00089 public:
00090 
00091     EGS_ExtendedShape(EGS_BaseShape *Shape, EGS_Float H1, EGS_Float H2,
00092         const string &Name="",EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0) :
00093         EGS_BaseShape(Name,f), shape(Shape), h1(H1), h2(H2), dh(h2-h1) {
00094         if( shape ) {
00095             shape->ref();
00096             otype = "Extended "; otype += shape->getObjectType();
00097         } else otype = "Invalid ExtendedShape";
00098     };
00099     ~EGS_ExtendedShape() {
00100         EGS_Object::deleteObject(shape);
00101     };
00102     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00103         EGS_Vector v(shape->getPoint(rndm));
00104         v.z += h1 + dh*rndm->getUniform();
00105         return v;
00106     };
00107 
00108 protected:
00109 
00110     EGS_BaseShape  *shape;
00111     EGS_Float      h1, h2, dh;
00112 
00113 };
00114 
00115 #endif
